title: Catstages Scratch, Snuggle & Rest Corrugated Cat Scratcher With Catnip (packaging may vary)
description: The Easy Life Scratch, Snuggle & Rest by Petstages is sure to be your kitty’s favorite perch and scratching post! This sturdy and lightweight scratcher platform is made from high-density cardboard that is constructed to last through hours of scratching. Great for redirecting destructive clawing behavior away from your furniture this bowl-shaped scratcher also comes with catnip to keep your kitty enticed and engaged before curling up for a cozy nap. The super strong construction can hold up to a 100 pound cat.
